item.title: Loplop Cryptic #002 [11×]
item.description:
I tried hard to make this one easier than #001, and I think I only partially succeeded: I’m too enamored with cheeky or punny definitions! Next week I’ll go even smaller (probably a 7×7) and really commit to using “plain language” definitions.

Huge thanks to Michael Colella and dianyx for test solves, and hope you enjoy!

item.title: Loplop Cryptic #001 [13×]
item.description:
This is the first cryptic crossword I’ve constructed in a while: I’m trying to get (back?) into the habit of making stuff regularly.

I’m still figuring out the difficulty of my crosswords: Crosshare tells me I’ve written a double black diamond, and an Internet stranger has called it “a mix of easy and diabolical clues”, which I’m inexplicably pleased by!

Anyways, a huge thank you to Steve Mossberg for the test solve, and I hope you enjoy!
